ProjectTitle: Using a natural speech paradigm to define neural restoration or compensation in persons with aphasia
InitialFeedbackHistory: 13/07/2022 7. [REDACTED] [REDACTED] is the reason not to share any data? [REDACTED] repositories give you the option to restrict access to your data files but others can easily find your datasets thanks to the associated metadata and you receive a DOI or accession number to list in your publications which may make collaboration easier. [REDACTED] disciplinary repositories (for example openneuro, neurovault, ebrains, GIN) are a good place to share but also to preserve your data, and you can also use the KU [REDACTED] repository RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)
label: good with suggestions
